cont.entity_a: Multiple replacements failed to connect to the internet. Wireless performance is poor in mixed environments. Wireless N devices do not connect.
cont.entity_b: Router has connectivity issues with multiple devices. Router loses connectivity randomly.

cont.entity_a: Customer support is unresponsive. Customer service is inadequate.
Product advertised for a discontinued service.
Advanced features suitable for SMB use.
cont.entity_b: DD-WRT software adds many features. DHCP Reservation is a valuable feature.

cont.entity_a: Setup is difficult and not user-friendly. VPN setup is not intuitive and lacks documentation.
cont.entity_b: Setup wizard is incompatible with Windows XP. Setup is easy for experienced users.

cont.entity_a: Firmware upgrade is simple and improves performance. Firmware updates do not resolve issues.
cont.entity_b: Linksys no longer provides firmware updates. Firmware updates required for optimal performance.

cont.entity_a: No dual antennas to eliminate multipath.
cont.entity_b: Router has good range and performance. Router functions well despite poor range. Router has poor wireless range compared to older models.

cont.entity_a: Router frequently crashes even with the latest firmware. Router crashes frequently during setup. Router requires constant supervision and restarts.
cont.entity_b: Router crashes occasionally and requires reboots. Router requires daily reboots for USB hard drive recognition. Standard firmware requires daily reboots.

cont.entity_a: QuickVPN software needs better support. SSH Sentinel VPN Client software is not supported.
Router is not suitable for beginners.

cont.entity_b: Router is fast and eliminates dead spots.
